verses.verse: For the director.[b] According to “Do not destroy!” A psalm of Asaph. A song.
We give thanks[c] to you, O God, we give thanks to you. For your wondrous deeds declare that your name is near.
[d]You say, “When I receive the assembly, I will judge with equity.
When the earth quakes, with all its inhabitants, it is I who will hold its pillars firm.[e] Selah
[f]“I say to the arrogant,[g] ‘Do not boast,’ and to the wicked, ‘Do not lift up your horns.
Do not rebel against heaven or speak with arrogance against the Rock.’ ”[h]
[i]For judgment does not come from east or west, nor from the wilderness or the mountains.[j]
Rather, it is God who judges rightly, humbling one and exalting another.[k]
The LORD holds in his hand a cup filled with foaming wine and richly spiced. When he pours it out, all the wicked[l] of the earth must drink; they will drain it down to the dregs.
As for me, I will proclaim this forever; I will sing praises[m] to the God of Jacob.
